name: Deezer 2015 Horizontal
description:
Instead of everything on your left side, it has been placed over the top. Basic functions such as profile access, searching and player controls will be available. You are able to view lyrics and scroll through the song queue as well as browsing albums and liking songs within the site. 

<strike>CHECK BACK WEEKLY FOR UPDATES!</strike>

additional_info:
1.0.0 | 11th Aug 2015
 Few issues, only a quick 1 hour experiment in developer mode.

Access to your profile is on the very left in the header, click the logo to view the "Hear This" page, the right has player controls.

- - - - - -

v1.0.5 | 12th Aug 2015
 Deliberate issues have been placed in this version - don't fear - this only affects the "Hear This" page. It is still usable in every way, though some posts may appear more left than usual.

 - Added settings button.
 - Fixed sizes in header.
 - Quick search box now moves in 3D.
 - Profile button now lights up when hovering.

- - - - - -

v1.0.6

 Fixes to deliberate issues in "Hear This". More issues have come out to play though, still making slight changes.

 - 3D entry effect, if supported...
 - Hear This feed has been widened, 1080p users will get the best experience, lower will have everything floating to the left.
